html: We need a bias for action to find a cure for Alzheimer’s. I know the reality of this disease. We can only win if our community comes together to #ENDALZ.pic.twitter.com/zCr2t3JP0Q
text:
We need a bias for action to find a cure for Alzheimer’s. 

I know the reality of this disease. My dad had Alzheimer’s and I experienced all the doctors visits and all the times he called me a name that wasn’t mine. 

We can only win if our community comes together to #ENDALZ.pic.twitter.com/zCr2t3JP0Q

html: While heading back from a powerful and raw weekend on the @FaithnPolitics Pilgrimage led by Congressman John Lewis, I have some reflections that I wanted to share with you all.
text: While heading back from a powerful and raw weekend on the @FaithnPolitics Pilgrimage led by Congressman John Lewis, I have some reflections that I wanted to share with you all.

html: Today we marched across the Edmund Pettus Bridge, following the footsteps of those who faced violence & sometimes death for the civil rights movement. What happened here changed America forever. We honor them by recommitting ourselves in the fight for justice. #FPICivilRightspic.twitter.com/SZ3hIX7kBY
text:
Today we marched across the Edmund Pettus Bridge, following the footsteps of those who faced violence & sometimes death for the civil rights movement.

What happened here changed America forever.

We honor them by recommitting ourselves in the fight for justice.

#FPICivilRightspic.twitter.com/SZ3hIX7kBY

html: I’m looking forward to working with @RepLucyMcBath to do more when it comes to preventing gun violence. That’s why I’m excited to announce that we will hold our first ever gun violence prevention event with @RepLucyMcBath this year in the 6th District. There’s no time to waste.
text:
I’m looking forward to working with @RepLucyMcBath to do more when it comes to preventing gun violence. That’s why I’m excited to announce that we will hold our first ever gun violence prevention event with @RepLucyMcBath this year in the 6th District.

There’s no time to waste.

html: When I looked up to the House Gallery, I saw @MomsDemand. I was able to vote for this measure - but it's the work from regular people and grassroots organizations who have tirelessly advocated for gun violence prevention that got us here today.pic.twitter.com/mGp3m21sx0
text: When I looked up to the House Gallery, I saw @MomsDemand. I was able to vote for this measure - but it's the work from regular people and grassroots organizations who have tirelessly advocated for gun violence prevention that got us here today.pic.twitter.com/mGp3m21sx0

html: 25 years. That's how long it's been since the House has passed a major bill on gun violence prevention. Today we changed that. I was proud to support H.R. 8, a measure that requires universal background checks for all gun sales. #EndGunViolenceNow
text:
25 years.

That's how long it's been since the House has passed a major bill on gun violence prevention.

Today we changed that. I was proud to support H.R. 8, a measure that requires universal background checks for all gun sales. #EndGunViolenceNow

This day feels surreal for me. In 2016, I lost my nephew Ian to a fentanyl overdose at the age of 24 after five years of working with him to get treatment from some of the best programs and therapists possible. No family deserves to suffer the loss of a loved one to addiction.
text:
This day feels surreal for me. In 2016, I lost my nephew Ian to a fentanyl overdose at the age of 24 after five years of working with him to get treatment from some of the best programs and therapists possible.

No family deserves to suffer the loss of a loved one to addiction.

html: The numbers are devastating: - 192 people die every day from drug overdoses - Last year over 70,000 people died from drug overdoses - Americans are now more likely to die from an opioid overdose than a car crash This cannot continue. We must come together to end this crisis.
text:
The numbers are devastating:

- 192 people die every day from drug overdoses
- Last year over 70,000 people died from drug overdoses
- Americans are now more likely to die from an opioid overdose than a car crash

This cannot continue. We must come together to end this crisis.

html: This bipartisan group of freshmen will bring fresh eyes to one of the most devastating crises facing our country. We will: - Learn from experts and stakeholders - Visit institutions focusing on research and treatment - Promote legislation to tackle the epidemic
text:
This bipartisan group of freshmen will bring fresh eyes to one of the most devastating crises facing our country. We will:

- Learn from experts and stakeholders
- Visit institutions focusing on research and treatment
- Promote legislation to tackle the epidemic

html: Today in the @EdLaborCmte we talked about #PaycheckFairness and how investing in policies that ensure equity between women and men is simply good for business. When women are paid less than men, it hurts our families, our businesses, and our communities.
text:
Today in the @EdLaborCmte we talked about #PaycheckFairness and how investing in policies that ensure equity between women and men is simply good for business. 

When women are paid less than men, it hurts our families, our businesses, and our communities.
